bibl.title: ASMOSIA VII. Actes du VIIe colloque international de l'ASMOSIA, Thasos, 15-20 septembre 2003. Proceedings of the 7th International Conference of Association for the Study of Marble and Other Stones in Antiquity, Thasos, September 15-20, 2003
bibl.note: Introduction. - Quarry description. - Quarry age [Late (Pharaonic) Period or Ptolemaic Period]. - Dressed stone blocks. - Conclusions.
HARRELL J.A., The Bokari Granodiorite Quarry in Egypt's Eastern Desert. Avec résumé en anglais.

Yannis MANIATIS (Éd.), ASMOSIA VII. Actes du VIIe colloque international de l'ASMOSIA, Thasos, 15-20 septembre 2003. Proceedings of the 7th International Conference of Association for the Study of Marble and Other Stones in Antiquity, Thasos, September 15-20, 2003 = BCH. Supplément 51 (Athènes, 2009) pp. 175-186, 2 tabl., 9 figg.
